title: LF2M 5's
body:
Hey all, looking to try and fill ranks for a 5's team.

to play together regularly in the afternoon (anywhere between 5 - 9)

The aim for the most part with this is to play a lot of games together so we can develop synergy and not necessarily to climb (at least not until we have consistent turn up)

If this sounds like you, send me a tell in game.

preferably looking for a mid/top

Please note that regular attendance is required, if you want to just pop on once in a while then another team may be for you.

replies.body: added u msge me when you get a chance, sound like my sort of group
